description:
Kuyang, Krasue, or Palasik is a folklore about a demon in the form of a human head with body contents attached without skin and limbs that can fly to look for baby blood or women's blood after giving birth.[1] This creature is known to the people in Kalimantan. Kuyang is told as a human (woman) who demands the teachings of black magic to achieve eternal life.


cute illustration
During the day, a kuyang will go about his daily life like an ordinary person, but he usually wears a robe. At night Kuyang will fly to look for baby blood or delivery blood to be sucked as a means to increase the power of his knowledge. People who see kuyang flying usually see it as a big bird.[citation needed]

To deal with this, the victim needs to use a palm fiber broom or beat household furniture such as pots or pans sources wikipedia
